text: Gumercindo Álvarez Sotelo (born 13 January 1962) is a Mexican politician from the National Action Party. From 2000 to 2003 he served as Deputy of the LVIII Legislature of the Mexican Congress representing Morelos. ==References== Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Morelos Category:Members of the Chamber of Deputies (Mexico) Category:National Action Party (Mexico) politicians Category:21st-century Mexican politicians
title: Gumercindo Álvarez Sotelo
